com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.dpmeans

Class DPMeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.BaseClusterer
      • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.AbstractClusterer
        • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.kmeans.KMeans
          • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.dpmeans.DPMeans
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer

    public class DPMeans
extends KMeans
    The class implements the DP-Means clustering algorithm: Kulis, B. and Jordan, M.I., Revisiting k-means: New algorithms via Bayesian nonparametrics, 2011. This clusterer is useful when the number of clusters is unknown. Tuning is required to choose an appropriate threshold that controls when new clusters can be created.
    Author:
    slangevin

      • isCandidate

        protected boolean isCandidate(Instance inst,
                  Cluster candidate,
                  double score,
                  Cluster best,
                  double bestScore)
        Description copied from class: AbstractClusterer
        Method for determining whether a cluster is a better candidate than the previous best candidate cluster.
        Overrides:
        isCandidate in class KMeans
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance being clustered
        candidate - is the cluster
        score - is the double precision value of the distance score of inst to candidate
        best - is the current best cluster the inst can be added to
        bestScore - is the current best score
        Returns:
        true if candidate is a better cluster for inst than best
